mapper.select: select cgtr.*,p.id s_id,p.code s_code,p.value1 s_value1,p.value2 s_value2,p.sort s_sort,p.type_code s_type_code,p.description s_description,p.status s_status from (select cgt.*,p.id r_id,p.code r_code,p.value1 r_value1,p.value2 r_value2,p.sort r_sort,p.type_code r_type_code,p.description r_description,p.status r_status from (select c.*, p.id gt_id, p.code gt_code,p.value1 gt_value1,p.value2 gt_value2,p.sort gt_sort,p.type_code gt_type_code,p.description gt_description,p.status gt_status from (select * from auth_client where auth_client.client = #{clientId}) as c left join auth_client_grant_type gt on c.id = gt.client_id left join auth_property p on gt.grant_type_id = p.id) as cgt left join auth_client_resource r on cgt.id = r.client_id left join auth_property p on r.resource_id = p.id) as cgtr left join auth_client_scope s on cgtr.id = s.client_id left join auth_property p on s.scope_id = p.id;
